CustomField.description: Used in "Log a call with staging" flow, launched by "log a call" button, contains duplicate list of Business Objectives but with a "no change" option so that the flow can be launched without updating the business objective field
CustomField.inlineHelpText: should not be visible on page, contact admin if so
CustomField.label: Client Business Objectives Xfer

value.fullName: Generate additional referrals from clients and professional network
value.label: Generate additional referrals from clients and professional network

value.fullName: Increase number of new client listings
value.label: Increase number of new client listings

value.fullName: Win a greater percentage of prospective client presentations
value.label: Win a greater percentage of prospective client presentations

value.fullName: Expand geographical market presence and leads
